00037 #include <stdio.h>
00038 #include <math.h>
00039 #include "constants.h"
00040 #include "geodesy.h"
00041 #include "GNSS_RxData.h"
00042 #include "GNSS_Estimator.h"
00043 #include "GNSS_OptionFile.h"
00044 
00045 //#define _CRT_SECURE_NO_DEPRECATE
00046 #ifndef WIN32
00047 #define _CRT_SECURE_NO_DEPRECATE
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 using namespace GNSS;
00051 
00052 //#define EXTRACTSVDATA 
00053 
00054 
00055 /// \brief    Try to sychronize the base and rover measurement sources.
00056 /// \return   true if successful, false if error.
00057 bool GetNextSetOfSynchronousMeasurements( 
00058   GNSS_RxData &rxDataBase,  //!< The base station receiver data.
00059   bool &endOfStreamBase,    //!< A boolean that indicates if the end of the data has been reached for the base station.
00060   GNSS_RxData &rxDataRover, //!< The rover station receiver data.
00061   bool &endOfStreamRover,   //!< A boolean that indicates if the end of the data has been reached for the rover station.
00062   bool &isSynchronized      //!< A boolean to indicate if the base and rover are synchronized.
00063   );
00064 
00065 
00066 int main( int argc, char* argv[] )
00067 {
00068   GNSS_RxData rxDataBase;
00069   GNSS_RxData rxDataRover;  
00070   GNSS_Estimator Estimator;
00071   bool isValidPath;
00072   bool result;
00073   bool endOfStreamBase = false;
00074   bool endOfStreamRover = false;
00075   bool isSynchronized = false;
00076 
00077   char supermsg[8192];
00078   unsigned nrBytesInBuffer = 0;
00079 
00080   supermsg[0] = 0;
00081 
00082 
00083   unsigned i = 0;
00084   unsigned j = 0;
00085   //unsigned k = 0;
00086 
00087   double dT = 0.0;
00088   double time = 0.0;
00089   double time_prev = 0.0;
00090   
00091   double start_time = 0.0;
00092   double end_time = 604800.0;
00093 
00094   bool wasPositionComputed = false;
00095   bool wasVelocityComputed = false;
00096 
00097   FILE *fid = NULL; 
00098 #ifdef EXTRACTSVDATA
00099   FILE *svfid = NULL;
00100   unsigned short prn = 11;
00101 #endif
00102 
00103   GNSS_OptionFile opt;
00104 
00105   std::string OptionFilePath;
00106 
00107   bool useLSQ = true;
00108   bool useEKF = false;
00109   bool useRTK = false;
00110   
00111   bool isAtFirstEpoch = true;
00112 
00113   GNSS_structPVT firstPVT;
00114   GNSS_structPVT secondPVT;
00115   bool firstPVT_isSet = false;
00116 
00117   try
00118   {
00119     printf( "\nUSAGE: EGNSS <option file path>\n" );
00120     if( argc != 2 )
00121     {      
00122       return 0;
00123     }
00124     OptionFilePath = argv[1];
00125 
00126     if( !opt.ReadAndInterpretOptions( OptionFilePath ) )
00127     {
00128       printf( "\nInvalid option file.\n" );
00129       return 1;
00130     }
00131 
00132     // Set the start time.
00133     start_time = opt.m_StartTime.GPSWeek*SECONDS_IN_WEEK + opt.m_StartTime.GPSTimeOfWeek;
00134 
00135     // Set the end time.
00136     end_time = opt.m_EndTime.GPSWeek*SECONDS_IN_WEEK + opt.m_EndTime.GPSTimeOfWeek;
00137 
00138     if( opt.m_ProcessingMethod == "LSQ" )
00139     {
00140       useLSQ = true; // least squares is used for the first epoch
00141       useEKF = false;
00142       useRTK = false;
00143     }
00144     else if( opt.m_ProcessingMethod == "EKF" )
00145     {
00146       useLSQ = true; // least squares is used for the first epoch
00147       useEKF = true;
00148       useRTK = false;
00149     }
00150     else if( opt.m_ProcessingMethod == "RTK" )
00151     {
00152       useLSQ = true; // least squares is used for the first epoch
00153       useEKF = false;
00154       useRTK  = true;
00155     }
00156 
00157     if( opt.m_ProcessingMethod != "LSQ" )
00158     {
00159       Estimator.m_KF.alphaVn       = opt.m_KalmanOptions.alphaVn;
00160       Estimator.m_KF.alphaVe       = opt.m_KalmanOptions.alphaVe;
00161       Estimator.m_KF.alphaVup      = opt.m_KalmanOptions.alphaVup;
00162       Estimator.m_KF.alphaClkDrift = opt.m_KalmanOptions.alphaClkDrift;
00163       Estimator.m_KF.sigmaVn       = opt.m_KalmanOptions.sigmaVn;
00164       Estimator.m_KF.sigmaVe       = opt.m_KalmanOptions.sigmaVe;
00165       Estimator.m_KF.sigmaVup      = opt.m_KalmanOptions.sigmaVup;
00166       Estimator.m_KF.sigmaClkDrift = opt.m_KalmanOptions.sigmaClkDrift;
00167     }
00168 
00169 
00170 #ifndef _CRT_SECURE_NO_DEPRECATE    
00171     // Open the output file.
00172     if( fopen_s( &fid, opt.m_OutputFilePath.c_str(), "w" ) != 0 )
00173       return 1;
00174 #else
00175     fid = fopen( opt.m_OutputFilePath.c_str(), "w" );
00176     if( fid == NULL )
00177       return 1;
00178 #endif
00179     
00180 //#define EXTRACTSVDATA      
00181 #ifdef EXTRACTSVDATA
00182     //if( fopen_s( &svfid, "C:\\Zen\\Zenautics\\repos\\prj\\ZNav\\bin\\rover\\oem4wc\\ZNAV_SV.txt", "w" ) != 0 )
00183       //return 1;
00184 
00185 #ifndef _CRT_SECURE_NO_DEPRECATE    
00186     if( fopen_s( &svfid, "prn.txt", "w" ) != 0 )
00187       return 1;
00188 #else
00189     svfid = fopen( "theprn.txt", "w" );
00190     if( svfid == NULL )
00191       return 1;
00192 #endif
00193     
00194 #endif
00195     
00196     if( opt.m_Reference.isValid )
00197     {
00198       if( opt.m_RINEXNavDataPath.length() != 0 )
00199       {
00200         result = rxDataBase.Initialize( opt.m_Reference.DataPath.c_str(), isValidPath, opt.m_Reference.DataType, opt.m_RINEXNavDataPath.c_str() );
00201       }
00202       else
00203       {
00204         result = rxDataBase.Initialize( opt.m_Reference.DataPath.c_str(), isValidPath, opt.m_Reference.DataType, NULL );
00205       }
00206       if( !result )
00207       {
00208         printf( "\nBad path to the reference station data.\n" );
00209         return 1;
00210       }
00211 
00212       if( opt.m_klobuchar.isValid )
00213       {
00214         rxDataBase.m_klobuchar = opt.m_klobuchar;
00215         if( !opt.m_Reference.useIono )
00216           rxDataBase.m_DisableIonoCorrection = true;
00217       }
00218       else
00219       {
00220         rxDataBase.m_DisableIonoCorrection = true;
00221       }
00222       rxDataBase.m_elevationMask = opt.m_elevationMask*DEG2RAD;
00223       rxDataBase.m_locktimeMask  = opt.m_locktimeMask;
00224       rxDataBase.m_cnoMask       = opt.m_cnoMask;
00225 
00226       if( !opt.m_Reference.useTropo )
00227       {
00228         rxDataBase.m_DisableTropoCorrection = true;
00229       }
00230 
00231       result = rxDataBase.SetInitialPVT(
00232         opt.m_Reference.latitudeRads,
00233         opt.m_Reference.longitudeRads,
00234         opt.m_Reference.height,
00235         0.0, 0.0, 0.0,
00236         0.0, 0.0,
00237         0.0, 0.0, 0.0,  // position is fixed
00238         0.0, 0.0, 0.0,
00239         100.0,
00240         10.0 ); // position is fixed
00241       if( !result )
00242         return 1;
00243     }
00244 
00245     if( !opt.m_Rover.isValid )
00246     {
00247       return 1;
00248     }
00249 
00250     if( !opt.m_Reference.isValid && opt.m_RINEXNavDataPath.length() != 0 )
00251     {
00252       // Stand-Alone mode
00253       result = rxDataRover.Initialize( opt.m_Rover.DataPath.c_str(), isValidPath, opt.m_Rover.DataType, opt.m_RINEXNavDataPath.c_str() );
00254     }
00255     else
00256     {
00257       result = rxDataRover.Initialize( opt.m_Rover.DataPath.c_str(), isValidPath, opt.m_Rover.DataType, NULL );
00258     }
00259     if( !result )
00260       return 1;
00261     if( opt.m_klobuchar.isValid )
00262     {
00263       rxDataRover.m_klobuchar = opt.m_klobuchar;
00264       if( !opt.m_Reference.useIono )
00265         rxDataRover.m_DisableIonoCorrection = true;
00266     }
00267     else
00268     {
00269       rxDataRover.m_DisableIonoCorrection = true;
00270     }
00271     rxDataRover.m_elevationMask = opt.m_elevationMask*DEG2RAD;
00272     rxDataRover.m_locktimeMask  = opt.m_locktimeMask;
00273     rxDataRover.m_cnoMask       = opt.m_cnoMask;
00274 
00275     if( !opt.m_Rover.useTropo )
00276     {
00277       rxDataRover.m_DisableTropoCorrection = true;
00278     }
00279 
00280     
00281     result = rxDataRover.SetInitialPVT(
00282       opt.m_Rover.latitudeRads,
00283       opt.m_Rover.longitudeRads,
00284       opt.m_Rover.height,
00285       0.0, 0.0, 0.0,
00286       0.0, 0.0, 
00287       opt.m_Rover.uncertaintyLatitudeOneSigma, 
00288       opt.m_Rover.uncertaintyLongitudeOneSigma, 
00289       opt.m_Rover.uncertaintyHeightOneSigma, 
00290       1.0, 1.0, 1.0,
00291       1000.0,
00292       1.0e9 );
00293     if( !result )
00294       return 1; 
00295 
00296 
00297     while( !endOfStreamRover )
00298     {
00299       if( !isAtFirstEpoch ) 
00300       {
00301         time_prev = rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_week*SECONDS_IN_WEEK + rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_tow;
00302       }
00303 
00304       if( opt.m_Reference.isValid )
00305       {
00306         result = GetNextSetOfSynchronousMeasurements( 
00307           rxDataBase,
00308           endOfStreamBase,
00309           rxDataRover,
00310           endOfStreamRover,
00311           isSynchronized );
00312         if( !result )
00313           return -1;
00314       }
00315       else
00316       {
00317         result = rxDataRover.LoadNext( endOfStreamRover );
00318         if( !result )
00319           return -1;
00320       }
00321 
00322       if( endOfStreamRover )
00323         break;
00324 
00325       if( opt.m_Reference.isValid )
00326       {
00327         if( endOfStreamBase )
00328           break;
00329       }
00330 
00331       if( rxDataRover.m_nrValidObs == 0 )
00332         continue;
00333 
00334       // Check that the processing time is within the processing interval.
00335       time = rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_week*SECONDS_IN_WEEK + rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_tow;
00336       if( time < start_time )
00337         continue;
00338       if( time > end_time )
00339         break;
00340 
00341 
00342       // GDM_DEBUG breakpoint times
00343       if( rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_tow > 242005 )
00344         int ggg = 99;
00345 
00346       if( rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_tow > 353172 )
00347         int ggga = 99;
00348 
00349 
00350       if( isAtFirstEpoch )
00351       {
00352         isAtFirstEpoch = false;
00353         dT = 0.0;
00354       }
00355       else
00356       {
00357         dT = time - time_prev;      
00358         if( dT < 0.0 )
00359         {
00360           // should never happen
00361           printf( "\ndT is negative!\n");
00362           return 1; 
00363         }        
00364       }
00365 
00366         
00367       // exclude satellites as indicated in the option file
00368       for( j = 0; j < opt.m_Rover.nrSatsToExclude; j++ )
00369       {
00370         for( i = 0; i < rxDataRover.m_nrValidObs; i++ )
00371         {
00372           if( rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].id == opt.m_Rover.satsToExclude[j] )
00373           {
00374             rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].flags.isNotUserRejected = 0;
00375           }
00376         }
00377       } 
00378 
00379       if( opt.m_Reference.isValid )
00380       {
00381         // exclude satellites as indicated in the option file
00382         for( j = 0; j < opt.m_Reference.nrSatsToExclude; j++ )
00383         {
00384           for( i = 0; i < rxDataBase.m_nrValidObs; i++ )
00385           {
00386             if( rxDataBase.m_ObsArray[i].id == opt.m_Reference.satsToExclude[j] )
00387             {
00388               rxDataBase.m_ObsArray[i].flags.isNotUserRejected = 0;
00389             }
00390           }
00391         } 
00392       }
00393 
00394 
00395       if( useLSQ )
00396       {      
00397         if( opt.m_Reference.isValid )
00398         {
00399           result = Estimator.PerformLeastSquares_8StatePVT(
00400             &rxDataRover,
00401             &rxDataBase,
00402             wasPositionComputed,
00403             wasVelocityComputed );
00404           if( !result )
00405             return -1;
00406         }
00407         else
00408         {
00409           result = Estimator.PerformLeastSquares_8StatePVT(
00410             &rxDataRover,
00411             NULL,
00412             wasPositionComputed,
00413             wasVelocityComputed );
00414           if( !result )
00415             return -1;
00416         }
00417 
00418         if( !wasPositionComputed )
00419           continue;
00420 
00421         if( !wasVelocityComputed && (useEKF || useRTK) ) // compute initial velocity estimate for EKF or RTK if needed
00422         {            
00423           // Compute two consective position fixes and perform the difference
00424           // to initial the velocity filter.            
00425           if( !firstPVT_isSet )
00426           {
00427             firstPVT = rxDataRover.m_pvt;
00428             firstPVT_isSet = true;
00429             continue;
00430           }
00431           else
00432           {
00433             secondPVT = rxDataRover.m_pvt;
00434 
00435             double N = 0;
00436             double M = 0;
00437             double tmp_vn = 0;
00438             double tmp_ve = 0;
00439             double tmp_vup = 0;
00440             double tmp_clkdrift = 0;
00441             double deltaTime = (secondPVT.time.gps_week*SECONDS_IN_WEEK + secondPVT.time.gps_tow) -
00442               (firstPVT.time.gps_week*SECONDS_IN_WEEK + firstPVT.time.gps_tow);
00443 
00444             if( deltaTime < 1e-04 )
00445             {
00446               firstPVT_isSet = false;
00447               continue;
00448             }
00449 
00450             GEODESY_ComputeMeridianRadiusOfCurvature(
00451               GEODESY_REFERENCE_ELLIPSE_WGS84,
00452               rxDataRover.m_pvt.latitude,
00453               &M );
00454 
00455             GEODESY_ComputePrimeVerticalRadiusOfCurvature(
00456               GEODESY_REFERENCE_ELLIPSE_WGS84,
00457               rxDataRover.m_pvt.latitude,
00458               &N );
00459 
00460             tmp_vn = (secondPVT.latitude - firstPVT.latitude)*(M+secondPVT.height) / deltaTime;
00461             tmp_ve = (secondPVT.longitude - firstPVT.longitude)*((N+secondPVT.height)*cos(secondPVT.latitude)) / deltaTime;
00462             tmp_vup = (secondPVT.height - firstPVT.height) / deltaTime;
00463             tmp_clkdrift = (secondPVT.clockOffset - firstPVT.clockOffset) / deltaTime;
00464 
00465             result = rxDataRover.UpdateVelocityAndClockDrift(
00466               tmp_vn,
00467               tmp_ve,
00468               tmp_vup,
00469               tmp_clkdrift,
00470               5.0*deltaTime,
00471               5.0*deltaTime,
00472               5.0*deltaTime,
00473               5.0*deltaTime
00474               );     
00475             if( !result )
00476               return -1;
00477             wasVelocityComputed = true;              
00478           }            
00479         }
00480 
00481         if( wasPositionComputed && wasVelocityComputed )
00482         {
00483           if( useEKF || useRTK )
00484           {            
00485             useLSQ = false; // position/velocity is now seeded
00486             result = Estimator.InitializeStateVarianceCovariance_8StatePVGM(
00487               rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_lat,
00488               rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_lon,
00489               rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_hgt,
00490               rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_vn,
00491               rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_ve,
00492               rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_vup,
00493               rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_clk,
00494               rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_clkdrift,
00495               Estimator.m_P );  //KO Could use LS m_P here to keep all information from LS step.
00496 
00497             if( !result )
00498               return 1;
00499           }
00500         }
00501       }
00502       else if( useEKF )
00503       {
00504         result = Estimator.PredictAhead_8StatePVGM(
00505           rxDataRover,
00506           dT,
00507           Estimator.m_T,
00508           Estimator.m_Q,
00509           Estimator.m_P );
00510         if( !result )
00511           return 1;
00512 
00513         if( opt.m_Reference.isValid )
00514         {
00515           result = Estimator.Kalman_Update_8StatePVGM(
00516             &rxDataRover,
00517             &rxDataBase,
00518             Estimator.m_P );
00519           if( !result )
00520             return -1;
00521         }
00522         else
00523         {
00524           result = Estimator.Kalman_Update_8StatePVGM(
00525             &rxDataRover,
00526             NULL,
00527             Estimator.m_P );
00528           if( !result )
00529             return -1;
00530         }
00531       }
00532       else if( useRTK )
00533       {
00534         result = Estimator.PredictAhead_8StatePVGM_Float(
00535           rxDataRover,
00536           dT,
00537           Estimator.m_T,
00538           Estimator.m_Q,
00539           Estimator.m_P );
00540         if( !result )
00541           return 1;
00542 
00543         if( opt.m_Reference.isValid )
00544         {
00545           result = Estimator.Kalman_Update_8StatePVGM_SequentialMode_FloatSolution(
00546             &rxDataRover,
00547             &rxDataBase,
00548             Estimator.m_P );
00549           if( !result )
00550             return 1;
00551         }
00552         else
00553         {
00554           result = Estimator.Kalman_Update_8StatePVGM_SequentialMode_FloatSolution(
00555             &rxDataRover,
00556             NULL,
00557             Estimator.m_P );
00558           if( !result )
00559             return 1;
00560         }
00561       }
00562 
00563       printf( "%12.3lf %5d %d %d %d \n", 
00564         rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_tow, 
00565         rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_week,         
00566         rxDataRover.m_pvt.nrPsrObsUsed,
00567         rxDataRover.m_pvt.nrDopplerObsUsed,
00568         rxDataRover.m_pvt.nrAdrObsUsed );    
00569 
00570       /*
00571       char supermsg[8192];
00572       unsigned nrBytesInBuffer;
00573       rxDataRover.Debug_WriteSuperMsg80CharsWide( 
00574       supermsg,
00575       8192,
00576       51.0916666667*DEG2RAD,
00577       -114.0000000000*DEG2RAD,
00578       1000.000,
00579       nrBytesInBuffer );
00580 
00581       printf( supermsg );
00582       */
00583 
00584       rxDataRover.m_prev_pvt = rxDataRover.m_pvt;
00585       rxDataBase.m_prev_pvt = rxDataBase.m_pvt;
00586 
00587       fprintf( fid, "%12.4lf %4d %20.10lf %20.10lf %15.3lf %20.10lf %4d %10.4lf %10.4lf %10.4lf %20.10lf %10.4lf %10.4lf %10.4lf %10.4lf %10.2f %10.2f %10.2f\n", 
00588         rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_tow,
00589         rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_week,
00590         rxDataRover.m_pvt.latitudeDegs,
00591         rxDataRover.m_pvt.longitudeDegs,
00592         rxDataRover.m_pvt.height,
00593         rxDataRover.m_pvt.clockOffset,
00594         rxDataRover.m_pvt.nrPsrObsUsed,
00595         rxDataRover.m_pvt.vn,
00596         rxDataRover.m_pvt.ve,
00597         rxDataRover.m_pvt.vup,
00598         rxDataRover.m_pvt.clockDrift,
00599         rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_lat,
00600         rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_lon,
00601         rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_hgt,
00602         rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_clk,
00603         rxDataRover.m_pvt.dop.hdop,
00604         rxDataRover.m_pvt.dop.vdop,
00605         rxDataRover.m_pvt.dop.tdop        
00606         );        
00607 
00608 #ifdef EXTRACTSVDATA
00609       for( i = 0; i < rxDataRover.m_nrValidObs; i++ )
00610       {
00611         if( rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].id == prn &&           
00612           rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].system == GNSS_GPS &&
00613           rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].freqType == GNSS_GPSL1 
00614           ) 
00615         {
00616           fprintf( svfid, "%12.4lf %4d %10.1f %10.1f %10.1f %20.10lf %20.10lf %20.10lf %20.10lf\n", 
00617             rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_tow,
00618             rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_week,          
00619             rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].cno,
00620             rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].satellite.elevation*RAD2DEG,
00621             rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].satellite.azimuth*RAD2DEG,
00622             rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].psr_misclosure,
00623             rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].doppler_misclosure,
00624             rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].psr,
00625             rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].adr
00626             );
00627         }
00628       }        
00629 #endif
00630     }
00631 
00632     // close the output file
00633     fclose( fid );
00634 #ifdef EXTRACTSVDATA
00635     fclose(svfid);
00636 #endif
00637   }
00638   catch( MatrixException& matrixException )
00639   {
00640     printf( "%s", matrixException.GetExceptionMessage().c_str() );
00641   }
00642   catch ( ... )
00643   {
00644     printf( "\nCaught unknown exception\n" );
00645   }
00646 
00647   return 0;
00648 }
00649 
00650 
00651 
00652 bool GetNextSetOfSynchronousMeasurements( 
00653   GNSS_RxData &rxDataBase,  //!< The base station receiver data.
00654   bool &endOfStreamBase,    //!< A boolean that indicates if the end of the data has been reached for the base station.
00655   GNSS_RxData &rxDataRover, //!< The rover station receiver data.
00656   bool &endOfStreamRover,   //!< A boolean that indicates if the end of the data has been reached for the rover station.
00657   bool &isSynchronized      //!< A boolean to indicate if the base and rover are synchronized.
00658   )
00659 {
00660   bool result = false;
00661   double timeBase = 0;
00662   double timeRover = 0;
00663   double timeDiff = 0;
00664 
00665   isSynchronized = false;
00666 
00667   result = rxDataBase.LoadNext( endOfStreamBase );
00668   if( !result )
00669     return false;
00670   if( endOfStreamBase )
00671     return true;
00672 
00673   result = rxDataRover.LoadNext( endOfStreamRover );
00674   if( !result )
00675     return false;
00676   if( endOfStreamRover )
00677     return true;
00678 
00679   while( !endOfStreamBase && !endOfStreamRover )
00680   {
00681     timeBase  = rxDataBase.m_pvt.time.gps_week*SECONDS_IN_WEEK  + rxDataBase.m_pvt.time.gps_tow;
00682     timeRover = rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_week*SECONDS_IN_WEEK + rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_tow;
00683     timeDiff = timeBase - timeRover;
00684 
00685     if( fabs(timeDiff) < 0.010 ) // must match to 10 ms
00686     {
00687       isSynchronized = true;
00688       break; // synchronized
00689     }
00690 
00691     if( timeDiff < 0 )
00692     {
00693       // The rover time is ahead of the base time.
00694       result = rxDataBase.LoadNext( endOfStreamRover );
00695       if( !result )
00696         return 1;
00697     }
00698     else
00699     {
00700       result = rxDataRover.LoadNext( endOfStreamRover );
00701       if( !result )
00702         return 1;
00703     }
00704   }
00705 
00706   return true;
00707 }
